names.english: one hundred spirit and liver decoction
names.commonEnglish: One Hundred Spirit and Liver Decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, stops pain due to Blood Stasis and regulates the menses.
With Gan Cao, moderates spasms and relieves abdominal pain.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, cools the Blood and relieves pain.
Invigorates the Blood,expels Blood Stasis, nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Damp-Heat in the Lower Jiao.
Promotes the movement of Blood, promotes lactation and invigorates the channels.
Dredges Liver Qi, releases Stagnation, stops pain and conducts Heat out from below.
Breaks up Stagnant Qi, reduces accumulation, descends Qi, unblocks the bowels, removes Stagnant Food, transforms Phlegm and reduces distention.
Spreads Liver Qi, breaks up Stagnant Qi, dissipates accumulations, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Clears Lung Heat, transforms Hot Phlegm, regulates Qi and unbinds the chest.
Draws out toxicity, discharges pus, invigorates the Blood and reduces swelling.
Promotes urination, resolves Dampness and clears Heat.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Tonifies the Blood
Soothes the Liver
Unblocks the Liver
Moves Qi
Releases Stagnation
Eliminates Dampness
Resolves Phlegm
Regulates menstruation

symptoms: Inability to conceive for many years
Decreased and dark-colored menses that contain clots or
manifestations.tongue: Normal color or slightly red on the sides; if Stagnation of Qi arises from Blood Deficiency, the sides might be Pale
manifestations.pulse: Taut or Wiry; if Qi Stagnation arises from Blood Deficiency, it may be Choppy

modifications.purpose: more severe Qi and Blood Stagnation with breast distention
